comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do not edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: decay
description: Calculates a relevance score that decays based on the distance of a numeric, spatial or date type value from a target origin, using configurable decay functions.

params.name: value
params.description: The input value to apply decay scoring to.

params.name: origin
params.description: Central point from which the distances are calculated.

params.name: scale
params.description: Distance from the origin where the function returns the decay value.

params.name: options
params.mapParams: {name='offset', values=[], description='Distance from the origin where no decay occurs.'}, {name='type', values=[], description='Decay function to use: linear, exponential or gaussian.'}, {name='decay', values=[], description='Multiplier value returned at the scale distance from the origin.'}
